chunks.en: In the new year, bought an old energy miscellaneous brand car

![]( https://p.ipic.vip/tegthp.jpg)

By the way, is there anyone who wants to buy a manual 1.5 Swift, registered in 2018?
Today I plan to sell my 10-year-old Golf and replace it with a Xiaomi yu7
hahaha, V station actually has people who like driving. Mine is the same miscellaneous brand car, but I haven't driven a manual Swift yet. Swift is also a good car.
@rossroma They are all good cars. In my impression, Xiaomi cars have good product pricing now
Hahaha, Subaru fan...
@iintothewind Filled up for 270 yuan, runs 600 kilometers on the highway

chunks.en: @DoubleKing #5 Yes, if you switch to a BRZ, you can only run more than 300 kilometers on a tank of gas, and it also needs to eat fine grains.
I really like this car, but I might not buy it
@CCHome
@iintothewind #6 Sinopec on Wednesdays and Sundays, Shell every 8th
I've been dreaming of an mx-5, but unfortunately, I have to bow to reality
@xiangbohua Be young again, flowers can bloom again, but people don't have a second youth
@darkengine You can buy an mx5 and then a cheap family car
Congratulations op, shedding envious tears. If I didn't have a family, I would have chosen a BRZ to enjoy it, but people don't have a second youth. By the way, how much is the manual Swift?
If I owned a gas station, I would still prefer to drive a gasoline car, otherwise I would buy one less game every time I fill up
@iintothewind #2 I also mostly fill my Swift with 95 or 98, and the engine runs better
@chengchuan1009 Less than 3
@kidult Maybe it's an obsession, electric cars don't seem to give me a mechanical feel
@chengchuan1009 The original owner had a minor rear-end collision, so the price is a little lower than the market price

chunks.en: @chengchuan1009 #13 Actually, my family fully supports me, and we only have one car now. Sometimes it's inconvenient to go out and play or move large items, but fortunately, this situation doesn't happen often. Unfortunately, the cost of playing with cars here is much higher than in China. The modification fees and track day fees are all high, so I can't play with cars like I did in Shanghai.
